description:
Specifications* Bluetooth version: 3.0* Operation distance: Up to 10m* Operation voltage: 3.0-5.0V* Lithium battery capacity: 200mA* Working current: <5.0mA* Standby current: 2.5mA* Sleeping current: <200uA* Charging current: >100mA* Standby time: 60 days* Charging time: 4-4.5 hours* Uninterrupted working time: 45 hours* Lithium battery life: 3 years* Key life: 5 million strokes* Material: ABS Plastic (the keyboard); PU (the case)Retail Package Included1 x Leather Case with Detachable ABS Bluetooth Keyboard for Android & ios Tablet 
PC1 x USB Charging Cable1 x User Manual(NOTE: Tablet is not included)
title: Detachable Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard Stand Leather Case for Tablet PC 7″ 8″7inch 8 inch (Pink)
